channel.title: Richard Marquand on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Richard Marquand on jverkamp.com

item.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
item.description: You know, that is a really solid movie. I know a lot of people prefer Empire, but for whatever reason, I’ve always liked Return of the Jedi more. That holds true even more, although I have to say that there are a few (possibly nostalgia fueled) particulars that I like more before the special editions changed things.
